strings.Value: "Citizens of Pitax! Irovetti is dead — the tyrant is no more. If you think this is a time for riots, you are mistaken. Surrender the troublemaker to the guards and leave peacefully, or I will have to disperse you by force!"
"What are you doing? Shame on you! Look at yourselves — you're like animals! This is how your act after I freed you from that tyrant?"
"Let's go, Linzi. Let them do what they want. It's their city."
"Burn it all! The tyrant's dead, to the Hells with his legacy!"

{n}A crowd of citizens, armed with whatever they could find — bludgeons, daggers, torches — murmurs indignantly. They're listening to a student who stands above a young man lying in a puddle of blood. It takes a moment to realize that the wounded body is {/n} {d|Alondi}Alondi{/d}.

"An end to tyranny! An end to the humiliation and disgrace that despotic swindler Irovetti brought upon our city! You've all read Linzi's {d|Linzi Book True}book{/d}. You all know the rot that festers behind this facade! Lies, bullying, violence, and sycophancy — these are the arts Irovetti patronized! His favored students are all murderers, like this scumbag!" {n}The girl delivers a swift kick to Alondi's body.{/n} "Is this the kind of {g|Academy of Grand Arts}academy{/g} we need? Let the devils take it! Burn it all to the ground — burn away the rot so we can begin anew!"
"Stop! What are you doing? I didn't write the book to-"
{n}Linzi's words are drowned out by the joyful roar of the crowd.{/n} "Look! It's Linzi! She's here with us! Our hero! Come, throw the first torch!"
"It's our new {mf|king|queen}! Hurrah! Hurrah for the liberator!"
"They killed Alondi! I... I didn't want this! They're going to burn down the {g|Academy of Grand Arts}Academy{/g}! All because of my book..."
{n}The troublemaker tries to escape but is swiftly captured and handed over to the guards. The remaining crowd quickly scatters.{/n}
{n}The crowd's enthusiasm dies out. After a bit of confused clattering, the rioters clear out.{/n}
{n}Linzi stares at the {g|Academy of Grand Arts}Academy{/g}, then nods and turns away.{/n}

{n}Linzi looks at you, surprised. Then she looks at the academy, and a scowl crosses her face.{/n} "Yes! Burn it! To the {g|Abyss}Abyss{/g} with the {g|Academy of Grand Arts}Academy{/g}! To the Abyss with it all!"

{n}The crowd roars, a mix of rallying cries, curses toward Irovetti, and praise for you. Stones, then torches begin flying toward the {g|Academy of Grand Arts}Academy's{/g} windows, and smoke begins to billow over the building.{/n}
"Maybe you should have! That Alondi was an asshole, and he got what he deserved. And you won! They're looking at you like their leader. And you didn't even raise a sword for it — a quill was enough!"
